message: Bob, I propose a 52/48 split in my favor. Let's be reasonable and avoid further depreciation.
Let's split it 55/45, I'm taking a bigger risk with inflation.
Bob, time is money, and it's depreciating fast for you. I'll offer a 51/49 split. Take it before it gets worse!
I'll meet you in the middle, 52/48, but in my favor this time.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this 50.5/49.5 split - a slight advantage to me - before inflation eats away even more of your potential gain!
